article_title: About 50 let go at POMCO - Story
article_text:
Copyright 2016 Nexstar Broadcasting, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

Approximately 50 positions have been cut at Syracuse-based POMCO.

According to the company, it initially expanded its staff rapidly to match demand for Health Republic services – a product of Obamacare.

Regulatory agencies recently announced that they were shutting down Health Republic.

POMCO provides health insurance services for other companies.
